Sandro
4 åˆ†é˜ ·
Yesterday I was sick when I entered the field, I had a fever of almost 40 ° and I asked the doctor to give me a strong medicine that I could play. I expected to be able to play at least the first half. The result was important for my team and for me, I had to fight. I entered the field. I was cold, the coach looked at me and asked if I was okay. I told him I was fine. But, actually, I did not know how I was going to do it. The urge to play held me upright and firm. After the second half I was already dead. But, I kept myself strong. After the 120 minutes neither I myself believed that I had managed to run so much. Many just see the result. Few can see the way. The way is hard and difficult. The walk is arduous and tiring. But, the result ... Ha! The result is simply tasty.
